item.title: Issue #1634 created
item.description:
Decimal formats in XPath/XQuery static context: updates needed

See also #1630.

The description of the decimal format properties in the XPath and XQuery static context needs to be updated to align with changes defining the options map of the format-number function.

The XSLT xsl:decimal-format element also needs to be checked for consistency, though most of the required changes have been made.
